message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $80 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $130?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $110. Can you meet me at that price?
